Hi, I just tested my Postback parameter and it works well, I trigged the buy botton, the sale is Ok, but here in my Web Events the Event Value is " False", Can you fix it?

Hi there! It sounds like your Postback parameter is working, but the Event Value isn't being tracked correctly. Let's try to fix that. Could you please let me know which tracking platform or service you are using for the Postback? This will help me provide more specific instructions.

Thanks for letting me know you're using Digistore24. Unfortunately, we don't have a specific guide for Digistore24 integration. However, you can follow the general NewsBreak Postback integration guide to set up your Event Value correctly. Here's the link to the article: [How to integrate a general NewsBreak Postback](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25226963388813-How-to-integrate-a-general-NewsBreak-Postback). If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
I follow all instructions, the test at the end  shows: correct! than I press save and it is " false now. I bougth a product to do this test...

I'm sorry to hear that you're still experiencing issues even after following the instructions. Since you've already tested and confirmed the setup, but the Event Value is still showing as 'False', it might be a deeper issue with the integration. I recommend reaching out to our support team for further assistance. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with details about your issue, including screenshots if possible, and they will help you resolve this problem.

Thank you for providing the Event ID. I'll include this in the email content for our support team to review. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the following details and mention your Event ID: 1912180443254906882. They will assist you further in resolving this issue.
will I receive a email from the suport?

Yes, once you email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the details of your issue and the Event ID: 1912180443254906882, our support team will review your case and get back to you via email. Make sure to include as much detail as possible to help them assist you more efficiently.
